statements: DELETE FROM user_consent WHERE user_id = 123 AND name = 'John Doe'
DELETE FROM user_consent WHERE email = 'johndoe@example.com' AND consent_given = true AND name = 'Jane Smith'
DELETE FROM consent_logs WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND action_type = 'withdrawn';
DELETE FROM consent_logs WHERE timestamp < NOW() - INTERVAL '1 week';
DELETE FROM consent_history WHERE action_type = 'Data Processing Consent';
DELETE FROM data_sharing WHERE shared_with = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM user_permissions WHERE user_id = 100 AND consent_given = false;
DELETE FROM data_collection WHERE data_type = 'personal' AND data_collected_date < '2022-01-01';
